document_data.name: Aquamarine of spell extending
document_data.mainbody: An '''''aquamarine of spell extending''''' was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[aquamarine]] [[gem]] mounted within an [[hourglass]] made of [[gold]] and [[silver]].
document_data.Powers: Once per day, the wielder of the ''aquamarine'' could extend the duration of any of the [[spell]]s they cast, of 6{{th}} level or lower. Those who did not prepare their spells the day before they were cast had to take extra time casting for this to take effect.
